__e: It seems like if you had a rendezvous scheduled you'd know what day it was.
But there were a couple things that you didn't count on.
A baby was never in the cards for me.
And I know that you weren't plannin' on comin' back to these parts.
I hadn't planned on having someone in my life.
--I have no cash, wasn't expecting to dine out.
If you're so good, then why didn't you know... Mom would die in an accident!
It's all right, because I thought something like this might happen.
I wonder what the weatherman promises for tomorrow.
One very needy patient took way longer than expected.
This is What God has planned for me.
Do you remember the first time you foresaw someone's death?
Well, I'm loving the way it's going, this is exactly how I envisioned my life.

Well I never saw that coming Which I thought he would be saying to me right about now.

But I will be damned if she didn't just predict yours.
